mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detection_record_detail ( user_id, memory_id, description, classify, img_url, merged_image_url, binary_mask_url, analysis_result, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{memoryId}, #{description}, #{classify}, #{imgUrl}, #{mergedImageUrl}, #{binaryMaskUrl}, #{analysisResult}, #{createTime} )
